entities.description: As a subsection of the paper's methodology, this section provides a high-level introduction to the BookIndex component, explaining its purpose and role within the overall BookRAG system for handling complex documents, as detailed in the paper's fourth main section.
Refers to the core indexing component of the BookRAG system, which is introduced and overviewed in section 4.1.

relations.description: The concept of 'BookIndex' is the primary subject and topic of section 4.1.
